name: Stussy
text:
[Blocker]
[On Play] You may place 2 cards with a type including "CP" from your trash at the bottom of your deck in any order: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

effect.text: You may place 2 cards with a type including "CP" from your trash at the bottom of your deck in any order: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.
